Articles.Content: Hey y'all, I know this question has been asked several times in several places but I still can't figure it out. I've got KSP on steam just bought it, figured I'd do this one before getting 2. Chatterer is the only mod I'm trying to use. I downloaded using CurseForge and I can see the Chatterer folder in the correct Game Data folder and I'm even able to open the Mod toolbar in game, but no noise. I need to be spoken to like I'm 5 so I can figure this out. Help?
I have figured out that there was the second Game Data folder installed but I still can't figure out how to get things configured correctly. Feeling pretty dumb over here
Try it using CKAN.  That sets it up for you and makes sure you are using a compatible version.
